name: Dino Jump - Google Dino Game in First Person
name_original: Dino Jump - Google Dino Game in First Person
description:
Dino Jump is a unity game I made and is inspired by the Google Dinosaur Game. You have to jump over cacti of various sizes and shapes, like in the actual game, and there is also a day-night cycle.

It is still under development so it is missing a few features such as the pterodactyls and the scene will be worked on.

I also made a video about it on my channel:
